item.title: Demo
item.description: 1.安装hugo脚手架 https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ 1.1 Binary Install # Homebrew (macOS) brew install hugo # 验证安装 hugo version 1.2 Advanced Install mkdir $HOME/src cd $HOME/src git clone https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo.git cd hugo go install # 验证安装 hugo version 2.初始化站点 2.1 初始化blog # 使用hugo创建新站点: blog hugo new site blog cd blog/ git init # 使用新的Hugo maupassant主题, 这款挺不错 git submodule add https://github.com/rujews/maupassant-hugo themes/maupassant 2.2 初始化设置 cat > config.toml <<\EOF baseURL = "https://leesirc.github.io" languageCode = "zh-CN" title = "leesirc blog" theme = "maupassant" [author] name = "leesirc" [params] author = "leesirc" subtitle = "愿世界所有的美好都善良以待" keywords = "奔跑吧 骚年" description = "木子李" # 自定义菜单 [menu] [[menu.
